## MySQLConnectionOptions.charsetNumber property

Collation ID for the connection.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
charsetNumber?: number;
```

## Remarks

See [https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/adding-collation-choosing-id.html](https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.6/en/adding-collation-choosing-id.html)<!-- -->.
